channel.title: react on Phelipe Teles
channel.description: Recent content in react on Phelipe Teles

item.title: Automating svg to jsx conversion with svgr
item.description: I found that getting svg files from Figma ready to be used in your React applications can be a bottleneck and prone to error.

item.title: My experience testing React applications
item.description: Testing is not easy, it’s a trade-off: either you slow down new feature development by writing test to avoid regressions later, or you develop untested features and bugs will inevitably be introduced later.
